main_definition: A rider is someone who controls or accompanies a horse, motorcycle, bicycle, or other vehicle as a passenger or guide.

meanings_and_examples.example: She enjoys being a rider when she goes on weekend horseback riding trips.
The cyclists were all riders, pedaling along the scenic bike path.
He was a rider on his friend's motorbike touring around Europe last summer.
The park ranger acted as a rider, guiding the group through the dense forest trails.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Stylistic Element in Comics and Graphic Novels
meanings_and_examples.example: The comic artist used a 'rider' panel to depict motion between two panels of static images.
